item.title: Monell R club meets blogdown
item.description: R-Club was founded in March of 2016 by Dr. Danielle Reed. Dani says that “R-Club is like regular exercise - we just keep doing it and we get better gradually”. Clip art from: http://clipart-library.com/brain-excercising-cliparts.html
